Aloha John Papa!

My son did a two week Sea Turtle Camp expedition to Hawaii last summer. This year he says he’d like to go down and work/volunteer at Disney World in Florida for a summer adventure.

He’s 16 (but will be 17 in February), is an Eagle Scout and is advanced open water dive certified (in case they need help cleaning the tanks in Epcot ;?)

Any advice on where he might find an interesting mini-internship down in your neck of the woods?

Thanks!
